org.meltzg.edhd.submission

Class SubmissionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.meltzg.edhd.submission.SubmissionController

  • @RestController
public class SubmissionController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for retrieving information about EdHD submissions

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<StatusProperties>> getStatuses(java.security.Principal principal, java.util.List<java.util.UUID> submissions)
      Retrieves the status properties for the requested submission IDs If the user is not an admin, only the statuses of their own submissions and the validator can be retrieved
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.util.UUID>> getSubmissionIds(java.security.Principal principal, java.util.UUID assignmentId)
      Retrieves a list of submission IDs for the given assignment.

      • getSubmissionIds

        @RequestMapping(value="/submission/status/{assignmentId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.util.UUID>> getSubmissionIds(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                            java.util.UUID assignmentId)
        Retrieves a list of submission IDs for the given assignment. if the user is an admin, this wll include the validator and all submission IDs. If not, only the validator and user's submissions will be returned
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic)
        assignmentId -
        Returns:

      • getStatuses

        @RequestMapping(value="/submission/status",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<StatusProperties>> getStatuses(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.util.List<java.util.UUID> submissions)
        Retrieves the status properties for the requested submission IDs If the user is not an admin, only the statuses of their own submissions and the validator can be retrieved

        submissions -
        Returns:
